      • tryLock

        public FileLock tryLock()
                 throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: StoreChannel
        Attempts to acquire an exclusive lock on this channel's file.
        Specified by:
        tryLock in interface StoreChannel
        Overrides:
        tryLock in class StoreFileChannel
        Returns:
        A lock object representing the newly-acquired lock, or null if the lock could not be acquired.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        ClosedChannelException - if the channel is closed.
